content: asking why you aren't SR is like working backwards because you already have so many built in conclusions. The first is that there's such a thing as SR to get to. The second being that there's a you that doesn't match that image. The third is that there are others that are SR. When everything is dropped and no comparison is made only then can there be some space. Every time there's a thought and comparing it with what someone else said or separating that thought into either good or bad thought is itself causing the neuroticism. When everything is dropped only then can there be room.
